name: void (itch) (alleleeflores)
description:
Void is a non-linear story game that focuses on the topic of mental health. 

I authored this story based on own personal experiences and decided to share a piece of how I feel on a daily basis. 

I made this game for my final assessment, which was to develop a hypertext story with the use of  HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. The story must bridge elements of a story in the use of hyperlinks.

Though.. for the reason that I wasn't able to include music and sound effects in my narrative, I decided to remake and reconstruct my game on Twine.

I'm not fully satisfied with it. I believe that it lacks depth. I couldn't entirely express how I feel in the game, but maybe one day, I'll improve it.

In short, thank you for playing Void. Interpret the narrative however you take it. <3
